LoRaWAN.configNode: Select node communication band and set node LoRa address
LoRaWAN.connectAbpGateway: Connect node to gateway using ABP and configure necessary parameters
LoRaWAN.connectGateway: Start connecting to the gateway and send join request
LoRaWAN.connectGatewayAdvanced470: Advanced configuration for connecting to 470MHz gateway
LoRaWAN.connectGatewayAdvanced868: Advanced configuration for connecting to 868MHz gateway
LoRaWAN.connectGatewayAdvanced915: Advanced configuration for connecting to 915MHz gateway
LoRaWAN.connectNodeAdvanced470: Advanced configuration for connecting to 470MHz node
LoRaWAN.connectNodeAdvanced868: Advanced configuration for connecting to 868MHz node
LoRaWAN.connectNodeAdvanced915: Advanced configuration for connecting to 915MHz node
LoRaWAN.connectOtaaGateway: Connect node to gateway using OTAA and configure necessary parameters
LoRaWAN.initialize: Initialize module I2C address and configurations
LoRaWAN.isConnected: Check if node successfully joined. Returns true if connected
LoRaWAN.sendCommand: Send commands to query or configure node
LoRaWAN.sendData: Send data to a node at a specific address (range 1-255, 0 is invalid)
